name: Brescia University Online
overview:
Brescia University was born from the Mount Saint Joseph Junior College for Women, established in 1925. Co-ed extension courses led to the formation of a second campus in Owensboro, Ky. The two campuses consolidated to form Brescia University in 1950. Brescia University continues to expand and is proud to offer an alternative learning environment for distance learners through BUonline.

We believe all students who want to learn should be empowered to do so in a format that fits their individual needs. That’s why BUonline was developed to bring the classroom to you. Our online programs offer the convenience, flexibility and affordability you need to move forward in your career with minimum disruption to your other life commitments.

Brescia University has a long-standing reputation for academic excellence. Our professors are accomplished in their fields and have the insight and experience necessary to help students transition from the classroom to the real world. With BUonline, students receive the same quality education online that they would have in a traditional classroom.
